name: Winter Coat
description:
A Short Tailed Weasel - also known as an Ermine with it's white winter coat - peers out cautiously from its shelter to prepare to explore the snowy landscape in search of food. (Mustela erminea)

2019. Nikon D60, 55-200mm Lens.

Photographed in situ, without the use of artificial lighting or staging. Photoshop only used for resizing.

1024x685 300dpi jpeg

Garden Friends Series: Part 1 - Mammals IV
